snippet.title: Mergelandia - Core Games Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In this hybrid merge-strategy game, you are in charge of merging your kingdom to greatness. Merge and fight your way across various territories, conquer bandits, unite the elements, and uncover mysteries, all through the power of merging!  Available now for free on Core.  Visit coregames.com to download and play today!

Try Core today by signing up at https://coregames.com | Core API Documentation & Tutorials: https://docs.coregames.com | Core Creator Forums: https://forums.coregames.com
